dataArchitecture.title: Data Layer Architecture
dataArchitecture.subtitle: Centralized data management for the CyberEco ecosystem

overview.title: Unified Data Layer
overview.description: CyberEco implements a revolutionary architecture where the Hub serves as a centralized data layer, while applications operate as lightweight consumers of this shared data infrastructure.
overview.point1: Single source of truth for all shared data

benefits.title: Benefits & Impact
benefits.phase3Desc: P2P sync, blockchain, user data pods

hubGateway.title: Hub Gateway & Proxy
hubGateway.subtitle: Unified entry point for all CyberEco applications

overview.title: Hub: Your Gateway to CyberEco
overview.description: The Hub serves as both the authentication center and intelligent proxy for the entire CyberEco ecosystem, providing seamless access to all applications through a single entry point.
overview.ssoDesc: Authenticate once and access all CyberEco applications seamlessly
overview.proxyDesc: Routes requests to appropriate applications while maintaining authentication
overview.discoveryDesc: Beautiful landing page showcasing all available CyberEco applications

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contactPage.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon!

philosophyPage.title: Our Philosophy
philosophyPage.subtitle: Building a human-centered digital future where technology serves life, not the other way around
philosophyPage.manifestoQuote: A human-centered digital ecosystem for conscious, connected, and sustainable living.
philosophyPage.manifestoText: We believe in a world where digital tools enhance human potential rather than exploit it. Where privacy is a right, not a luxury. Where communities thrive through connection, not manipulation. Where technology serves consciousness, creativity, and collective wellbeing.
philosophyPage.manifestoBelief1: Digital sovereignty - You own your data, your identity, your digital life
philosophyPage.manifestoBelief2: Human flourishing - Technology that nurtures wellbeing, not addiction
philosophyPage.manifestoBelief3: Meaningful connection - Real relationships over engagement metrics
philosophyPage.digitalSovereigntyQuote: Your data is yours. Your identity is yours. Your digital life is yours.
philosophyPage.digitalSovereigntyMeans1: You control who sees your data and how it's used
philosophyPage.digitalSovereigntyMeans2: You can export, delete, or transfer your information anytime
philosophyPage.digitalSovereigntyMeans3: Your privacy settings are respected across all our applications
philosophyPage.digitalSovereigntyMeans4: No hidden tracking, no selling your data, no dark patterns
philosophyPage.digitalSovereigntyImpl4: Regular security audits and transparency reports
philosophyPage.wellbeingQuote: Technology should reduce stress, not create it. It should save time, not waste it.
philosophyPage.wellbeingMeans1: Intuitive interfaces that respect your cognitive load
philosophyPage.wellbeingMeans2: Features designed to reduce screen time, not maximize it
philosophyPage.wellbeingMeans3: No addictive mechanisms or manipulative design
philosophyPage.wellbeingMeans4: Tools that promote balance and mindful technology use
philosophyPage.wellbeingImpl4: Emphasis on quality interactions over quantity
philosophyPage.interconnectionQuote: Life doesn't happen in silos. Neither should your digital tools.
philosophyPage.interconnectionMeans2: Shared data and insights across your digital ecosystem
philosophyPage.interconnectionMeans4: Holistic approach to digital life management
philosophyPage.communityQuote: The best solutions come from the people who use them every day.
philosophyPage.communityMeans3: Community contributions are welcomed and valued
philosophyPage.communityMeans4: Decisions made in the open, not behind closed doors
philosophyPage.communityImpl2: Regular community calls and feedback sessions
philosophyPage.opennessQuote: Trust is built through transparency, not promises.
philosophyPage.opennessMeans1: Our code is open for inspection and contribution
philosophyPage.opennessMeans2: Our business model is clear and sustainable
philosophyPage.opennessMeans4: Our mistakes and learnings are shared publicly
philosophyPage.opennessImpl1: All code published under open source licenses
philosophyPage.opennessImpl2: Public documentation of architecture and decisions
philosophyPage.opennessImpl3: Regular updates on progress and challenges
philosophyPage.opennessImpl4: Open financial reporting for key metrics
philosophyPage.ctaText: We're building more than software. We're building a new relationship between humans and technology.
philosophyPage.implementationText: These aren't just words. Every line of code, every design decision, every feature reflects these principles.
philosophyPage.privacyText: Privacy isn't an afterthought—it's built into every layer of our architecture.
philosophyPage.decentralizedText: Moving towards a world where you're not dependent on any single provider.
philosophyPage.innovationText: Pushing boundaries while respecting human values and planetary limits.
philosophyPage.humanCenteredText: Technology that adapts to you, not the other way around.
philosophyPage.visionText: We're building more than software. We're creating a movement towards conscious technology use, genuine human connection, and sustainable digital practices.
philosophyPage.visionSustainableDesc: Minimal resource usage, maximum human benefit
philosophyPage.visionDecentralizedDesc: No single point of failure or control
philosophyPage.visionOpenSourceDesc: Transparency and collaboration at every level
philosophyPage.visionEthicalDesc: Success measured in human wellbeing, not just profit
philosophyPage.joinText: Be part of building a more conscious, connected, and sustainable digital future.
